trade.orders.emptyState.description: Seems like you have not made any orders yet. Have fun trading on Hydration
trade.orders.swapDetail.title: Swap details
trade.orders.dcaDetail.title: Order details
trade.cancelOrder.title: Sure you want
to stop your trade?
trade.cancelOrder.recap.limitedBudget: Are you sure you want to close this trade?
trade.cancelOrder.recap.openBudget: Are you sure you want to close this trade?
trade.orders.pastExecutions.title: Past executions
swap.settings.modal.title: Swap settings
swap.settings.modal.description: Reduce cost for bigger orders with high price
swap.settings.modal.single.slippage.desc: Here you can control the maximum allowed deviation between your desired price and the actual execution price. Such deviation can be caused by protocol fees, price impact (trade size vs liquidity), or price changes due to trading activity.
market.summary.priceImpact.tooltip: The impact your trade has on the market price of pools in the route.
market.summary.minReceived.tooltip: Minimum amount that you are guaranteed to receive if the price slips by maximum slippage set for this trade. If the price slips any further, your transaction will be reverted. Your current settings:
market.summary.maxSent.tooltip: Maximum amount that you are guaranteed to pay if the price slips by maximum slippage set for this trade. If the price slips any further, your transaction will be reverted. Your current settings:
market.summary.estTradeFees.tooltip: The fees that ensure the best experience with Hydration platform and have already been incorporated into this quote.
market.summary.routes.label: Order routing
market.warn.changeSlippage: Split trade likely to fail due to slippage - please adjust your slippage settings or reduce trade size.
market.warn.useDca: Your trade may be too large for efficient Split Trade execution - please try our DCA page or increase slippage to ensure successful execution.
market.error.insufficientBalance: Your trade is bigger than your balance.
market.error.insufficientTradingAmount: Your order size is lower than the minimum for trading.
market.error.maxOutRatioExceeded: Your order size exceeds the trading limit, please split your trade.
market.error.maxInRatioExceeded: Your order size exceeds the trading limit, please split your trade.
market.twap.loading: {{noOfTrades}} trades × {{in}} placed during next {{timeframe}} amounting to a total of {{inTotal}} submitted
market.twap.success: {{noOfTrades}} trades × {{in}} placed during next {{timeframe}} amounting to a total of {{inTotal}} placed
market.twap.error: {{noOfTrades}} trades × {{in}} placed during next {{timeframe}} amounting to a total of {{inTotal}} failed
dca.settings.modal.title: DCA settings
dca.settings.modal.description: Tolerated price deviation from the last known price. Trade will be rescheduled if the price changes more than the specified percentage since previous block or 10 block average.
dca.settings.modal.slippage.help: If the price slips further than slippage limit, your transaction will be reverted and will be retried based on settings for maximum of retries.
dca.settings.modal.maxRetries.help: The maximum number of retries of reverted transaction. Every retry has its transaction costs.
dca.duration.label: Over the period of:
dca.orders.label: No. of Orders
dca.assetIn.title: For total budget
dca.assetOut.title: Get
dca.priceImpact.warning.confirmation: I understand and want to proceed regardless.
dca.summary.limitedBudget.description: Swap <0>{{ sellAmount }}</0> for <0>{{ buySymbol }}</0> every <0>{{ frequency }}</0> over the period of <0>{{ duration }}.</0>
dca.summary.openBudget.description: Spend <0>{{ sellAmount }}</0> every <0>{{ duration }}</0> to buy <0>{{ buySymbol }}</0> until my balance runs out.
dca.footer.message: Budget & fee will be reserved for this trade.
dca.warnings.priceImpact.canContinue: Your price impact is {{ percentage }}. Reduce your loss by adjusting DCA parameters or confirm that you want to proceed anyway.
dca.warnings.priceImpact.cantContinue: Your price impact is {{ percentage }}. Reduce your loss by adjusting DCA parameters.
dca.warnings.collateral: In order to use this asset for open budget DCA please disable it as collateral.
dca.errors.minOrders: The minimum number of orders is {{ count }}
dca.errors.maxOrders: The maximum number of orders is {{ count }}
dca.errors.minOrderBudget: Your order size is lower than the minimum for DCA. Please lower the number of orders or increase your DCA budget.
dca.errors.priceImpact: Your price impact is {{ percentage }} which is higher than your Slippage protection. Please adjust your DCA parameters or your slippage settings.
dca.openBudget.tx.loading: DCA submitted: Spend {{amountIn}} every ~{{frequency, interval}} to buy {{assetOut}} until my balance runs out
dca.openBudget.tx.success: DCA scheduled: Spend {{amountIn}} every ~{{frequency, interval}} to buy {{assetOut}} until my balance runs out
dca.openBudget.tx.error: DCA failed: Spend {{amountIn}} every ~{{frequency, interval}} to buy {{assetOut}} until my balance runs out
dca.limitedBudget.tx.loading: DCA submitted: Spend {{amountIn}} every ~{{frequency, interval}} to buy {{assetOut}} with a total budget of {{amountInBudget}}
dca.limitedBudget.tx.success: DCA scheduled: Spend {{amountIn}} every ~{{frequency, interval}} to buy {{assetOut}} with a total budget of {{amountInBudget}}
dca.limitedBudget.tx.error: DCA failed: Spend {{amountIn}} every ~{{frequency, interval}} to buy {{assetOut}} with a total budget of {{amountInBudget}}
otc.noOrders: You don't have any active orders.
otc.placeOrder.title: Place order
otc.placeOrder.description: Define the amount you would like to offer and price or  final amount you would like to receive for your assets.
otc.placeOrder.loading: Placing an OTC order for {{ amount }}.
otc.placeOrder.error: Failed to place OTC order for {{ amount }}.
otc.placeOrder.validation.sameAssets: Cannot place order for the same asset.
otc.placeOrder.priceGainWarning.buy: Buying {{ asset }} above market price. Your price is {{ percentage }} higher. Check out our Swap page or confirm that you want to continue anyway.
otc.placeOrder.priceGainWarning.offer: Selling {{ asset }} below market price. Your price is {{ percentage }} lower. Check out our Swap page or confirm that you want to continue anyway.
otc.placeOrder.priceGainWarning.confirma: I understand and want to proceed regardless.
otc.fillOrder.title: Fill order
otc.fillOrder.loading: Filling an OTC order for {{ amount }}.
otc.fillOrder.error: Failed to fill OTC order for {{ amount }}.
otc.fillOrder.validation.orderTooBig: The amount exceeds the size of the order.
otc.fillOrder.partiallyFillable.title: Partially fillable
otc.fillOrder.partiallyFillable.descript: Allow users to fill smaller parts of this offer
otc.cancelOrder.loading: Cancelling an OTC order for {{ amount }}.
otc.cancelOrder.error: Failed to cancel OTC order for {{ amount }}.
